## TNode.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `TNode` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(key: string, options?: TNodeInit<Data>);
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | key of this node |
|  options | [TNodeInit](./static-tree.tnodeinit.md)<!-- -->&lt;Data&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> the [TNodeInit](./static-tree.tnodeinit.md) instruction |
